content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”3.0.64″][et_pb_row custom_padding=”0px|||” parallax_method_1=”off” background_position_1=”top_left” background_repeat_1=”no-repeat” admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”3.0.64″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”off” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”no-repeat”][et_pb_text text_orientation=”center” admin_label=”Heading disclaimer” _builder_version=”3.0.64″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”0px|||”]

DISCLAIMER

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text text_orientation=”justified” admin_label=”Heading text disclaimer” _builder_version=”3.0.64″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”0px|||”]

Please take the time to read and understand our Disclaimer. The following is the legal contact between You (Client) and bitcoindoubler.tech By making an investment with us you automatically state that you have read, fully understood, accept and agree to abide by our Disclaimer when using our services. Disclaimer defines bitcoindoubler.tech services including Client`s and bitcoindoubler.tech obligations in regard to any transactions through bitcoindoubler.tech website.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”0px|||” parallax_method_1=”off” background_position_1=”top_left” background_repeat_1=”no-repeat” admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”3.0.64″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”off” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”no-repeat”][et_pb_text text_orientation=”justified” admin_label=”Text disclaimer” _builder_version=”3.0.64″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”]

1. General

1.1. Residents of any country can open an account at bitcoindoubler.tech.

1.2. Client invests Bitcoins into investment plan offered by bitcoindoubler.tech using 1 type of crypto-currency.

1.3. bitcoindoubler.tech requires you to act as an individual and not on behalf of any other entity or authority.

 

2. Investment Plans

2.1. Client deposits money into one investment plan as follows: Investment of 0.005 BTC up to 10 BTC on our 10 hour investment plan with 200% interest

2.2. The minimum for depositing to the investment plan is 0.005 BTC and there is a 10 BTC maximum limit.

2.3. bitcoindoubler.tech can modify investment plan conditions any time.

 

3. Depositing Bitcoins

3.1. Depositing Bitcoins to bitcoindoubler.tech is executed with 1 type of cryptocurrency in accordance with this Agreement.

3.2. You must deposit Bitcoins only to the cryptocurrency address given on the Investment page. You can make as many deposits as you want to the addresses given on the Investment.

3.3. The deposit will be added to the list of investments after the transaction is confirmed by the network (1 confirmation is required).

 

4. Payouts

4.1. bitcoindoubler.tech investment plan earnings are paid out 24/7, 7 days a week (including holidays and other non-working days).

4.2. Unavailability of bitcoindoubler.tech website due to technical reasons, downtime, does not have affect on the payouts.

4.3. The payout usually takes around 10 minutes (automatic & instant). In some cases the payout could be delayed up to 12 hours, because we need to refill the hot wallet of the cryptocurrency.

4.4. The commission for cryptocurrency transfer is paid by us.

 

5. Warranties

5.1. bitcoindoubler.tech warrants the safety of the invested amounts and interest stability.

5.2. bitcoindoubler.tech guarantees all payments made in time and under the terms stipulated in this Agreement.

5.3. bitcoindoubler.tech is not associated with any cryptocurrency payment system and not liable for any problems in their performance.

 

6. Accepting Disclaimer

6.1. Accepting our disclaimer is the same with signing a contract so when you will make an investment, your acceptance of our rules will act like an electronic signature on a contract. You agree that your age is legal in your country to participate in this program, and in all the cases your minimal age must be 18 years.

6.2. You agree to invest money only which you can afford to lose. You understand that in all investment arrangements past performance is no guarantee of the same future performance. Future earnings can be different with past earnings. We have the right to configure our existing investment plans anytime.

6.3. You agree that all information, communications and materials you will find on this website are intended to be regarded as an informational and educational matter and not an investment advice.

6.4. You acknowledge that you are acting as an individual and not for any other entity. By investing, you agree, acknowledge, and accept that all information you receive is unsolicited, private communications of privileged, proprietary, and confidential information for you only and you agree to keep it private, confidential, and protected from any disclosure unless the information is obviously of a public nature.

 

7. Copyright

7.1. We respect the intellectual property rights of others, and require that the people who use bitcoindoubler.tech do the same.

7.2. The contents of this site is protected by copyright and trademark laws, and are the property of bitcoindoubler.tech . Unless we say otherwise, you may access the materials located within bitcoindoubler.tech only for your personal use.

7.3. You may not modify, copy, publish, display, transmit, adapt or in any way exploit the content of bitcoindoubler.tech website. Only if you obtain prior written consent from us – and from all other entities with an interest in the relevant intellectual property – you may publish, display or commercially exploit any material from bitcoindoubler.tech. To seek our permission, you may contact us.

 

8. Liability and Force Majeure

8.1. bitcoindoubler.tech is not responsible for delays in transmission of an order due to any reasons beyond its control. bitcoindoubler.tech does not control signal power, data transmission and receipt via Internet, or configuration of the Client`s computer equipment and reliability of its connection.

8.2. bitcoindoubler.tech is not accountable for any damage or loss of data caused by any events, actions or omissions, that lead to delay or distortions in the transmission of information, requests and orders due to a breakdown in any transmission facilities that are beyond the control of bitcoindoubler.tech.

8.3. bitcoindoubler.tech cannot be held responsible for any data communication failure, distortion or delay if problems are from Client`s side.

8.4. bitcoindoubler.tech is not liable for any default under this Agreement resulted from force majeure circumstances, including but not limited to military actions, wars, strikes, rebellions, natural disasters, governmental bans, any breakdown in normal communications or utilities infrastructure services, etc.

 

9. Disclaimer Amendments

9.1. bitcoindoubler.tech reserves the right to modify Disclaimer at any time. You should check Disclaimer periodically for changes. By using this site after we post any changes to these Disclaimer, you agree to accept those changes, whether or not you have reviewed them. If at any time you choose not to accept these Disclaimer of use, please do not use this site.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row parallax_method_1=”off” _builder_version=”3.0.47″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”off”][et_pb_button button_url=”#bitcoindoubler” button_text=”BACK TO TOP” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”3.0.47″ custom_button=”on” button_use_icon=”on” button_icon=”%%0%%” background_color=”#dd9933″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
